Question: Shenzhen Baiqiancheng Electronic Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Baiqiancheng Electronic Co., Ltd

Product: PCB Assembly Services

- Full range of services including printed circuit board assembly (PCBA), mechanical design, box build, and testing
- Offer services for various industries such as energy storage, industrial controller, consumer electronics, communication electronics, medical devices, and customized electronics
- Strong R&D engineering team for joint-design assistance
- SMT quick turn workshop for quick sample making
- Introduced MES system for improved production efficiency
- Wide range of services including customized electronics contract manufacturing, low volume high mix PCB assembly, PCBA prototype, conformal coating service, complex cable assembly, and more
- Strong quality control capabilities with strict compliance to ISO standards and certifications such as ISO9001, ISO14001, ISO13485, IATF16949
- Obtained Certificate of High & New Technological Enterprise and selected into the List of "Specialized and Special new" Enterprises in Shenzhen
- Can provide ODM/joint design services based on PCB assembly services
Summary_cn:
深圳百千城电子有限公司

产品：PCB组装服务

- 提供全方位服务，包括印制电路板组装（PCBA）、机械设计、机箱组装和测试
- 为能源储存、工业控制器、消费电子产品、通信电子产品、医疗设备和定制电子产品等各行各业提供服务
- 强大的研发工程团队，提供联合设计协助
- SMT快速制样车间，可进行快速样品制作
- 引入MES系统，提高生产效率
- 提供广泛的服务，包括定制电子产品的合同制造、低批量高商混合PCB组装、PCBA原型制作、防护涂层服务、复杂电缆组装等等
- 强大的质量控制能力，严格遵守ISO标准和认证，如ISO9001、ISO14001、ISO13485、IATF16949
- 获得了高新技术企业证书，并入选深圳市“专精特新”企业名单
- 可根据PCB组装服务提供ODM/联合设计服务
